pr_title: chore: update rxjava and rxandroid to v3

timeline.message:
chore: update rxjava and rxandroid to v3

Use the latest RxJava and RxAndroid dependency versions:

RxJava 3.0.6
RxAndroid 3.0.0

chore: update rxjava and rxandroid to v3

Use the latest RxJava and RxAndroid dependency versions:

RxJava 3.0.6
RxAndroid 3.0.0

timeline.bodyText: In a sense, I'm glad to see they're taking some of these away. Sometimes having less choices is a good thing.
timeline.author: rjuliano
